title: Can't uninstall League of Legends

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Hello, I haven't played LOL in a while but when I did I got this error. Tried uninstalling so i could reinstall but it won't let me.
I've deleted all files manually but I still get this error and while it's still there I can't redownload LOL again, help please?

replies.body: It's hard to tell what OS you're running, but in general League runs through the Programs Files folder of the C drive.  My suggestion here would be to download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), and run a clean uninstall and repair to remove any old files and start from scratch.  That should do the trick!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ErGP0rE4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-04T16:10:26.514+0000)
>
> It's hard to tell what OS you're running, but in general League runs through the Programs Files folder of the C drive.  My suggestion here would be to download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), and run a clean uninstall and repair to remove any old files and start from scratch.  That should do the trick!

holy moly bless you
